author: Jamie S
title: Great Hotel for Sightseers that dont want to pay Premium London Prices
text: My fiancee and I stayed here for 2 nights as we were attending a concert at the Brixton Academy. Hotel is in a great location for getting to Central London by using the tube, 7 mins to Victoria station! Rooms are newly refurbished and you can tell! Beds are comfy as always at a premier inn!. Is within 10 Min walk to Brixton Academyâ€‹ which was ideal! If coming back to London i will definitely be staying here!
